availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: John Howard (Scott County, Kentucky, farmer and stonemason, free person)

body.p: Scott County, Kentucky, farmer and stonemason. Virginia native. Married to Matilda Howard. Farmer and stonemason in Scott County, Kentucky in 1860. Resident of Owen County in 1864. Accused of operating a tippling house in Owen County in April 1864.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Scott County, District 2, p. 869.
KYR-0001-004-0728.
